mapper.insert: insert into username(name, password, email, roleid) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, select id from role where name = #{role})
mapper.select: select username.id as id, username.name as name, username.password as password, username.email as email, role.name as role from username, role where username.name = #{name} and role.id = username.roleid
select name from username where id = #{id}
